close_microwave_door.description: Close the microwave door by swinging it to the closed position.

clean_opened_door.description: Clean the opened door to remove any residuals.

open_microwave_door.description: Open the microwave door by swinging it to the opened position.

clean_closed_door.description: Clean the closed door to maintain the cleanliness of the microwave.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to set the time or mode of the microwave.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure it rotates smoothly and the marking are clearly visible.

clean_microwave_body.description: Clean the microwave body to keep the microwave looking new and tidy.

clean_whole_microwave.description: Clean the entire microwave including the door, knob and microwave body.
